BusinessInfinity.name: BusinessInfinity
BusinessInfinity.description: BusinessInfinity is a comprehensive business automation and orchestration platform that deploys on Azure Functions. It implements business-specific C-Suite agents (CEO, CFO, CMO, COO, CTO, CHRO), Founder, and Investor agents that inherit from the generic LeadershipAgent in AOS (Agent Operating System). Provides intelligent business decision-making, strategic planning, and operational excellence through AI-driven executive leadership.

CEO.description: Strategic leadership, organizational vision, stakeholder management, and executive decision-making

CFO.description: Financial strategy, budget management, investment analysis, and financial risk assessment

CMO.description: Marketing strategy, brand management, customer acquisition, and market research

COO.description: Operational excellence, process optimization, resource management, and quality assurance

CTO.description: Technology strategy, architecture design, innovation management, and security oversight

CHRO.description: Talent management, organizational culture, performance management, and employee development

Founder.description: Vision creation, company building, product development, and entrepreneurial leadership

Investor.description: Investment analysis, portfolio management, market research, and due diligence

functions.name: c_suite_orchestration
functions.description: Orchestrates C-Suite agents for comprehensive business leadership and decision-making.

functions.name: strategic_planning
functions.description: Provides strategic planning and vision execution through executive agent coordination.

functions.name: business_automation
functions.description: Automates business processes through intelligent agent-driven workflows.

functions.name: executive_analytics
functions.description: Delivers executive-level analytics and decision support through specialized agents.

BusinessInfinity.notes: All MCP protocol/client logic is now unified in AgentOperatingSystem (RealmOfAgents/AgentOperatingSystem). MCP communication is handled via Azure Service Bus and the AOS MCP client. All legacy MCP protocol/handler modules in BusinessInfinity have been removed.

PossibilityDrivenAgent.name: PossibilityDrivenAgent
PossibilityDrivenAgent.description: PossibilityDrivenAgent is a base agent module that determines the overarching Possibility for a system or organization. It provides foundational logic for agents that derive their Purpose from Possibility, and is inherited by PurposeDrivenAgent and other domain agents.
PossibilityDrivenAgent.relationship: base for PurposeDrivenAgent and domain agents

C-Suite.name: C-Suite
C-Suite.description: C-Suite represents the executive leadership team within BusinessInfinity. All C-Suite agents inherit from LeadershipAgent in AOS and implement business-specific functionality. Each agent follows the one-class-per-file architecture and provides specialized executive capabilities.

functions.name: executive_leadership
functions.description: Provides comprehensive executive leadership through specialized C-Suite agents.

functions.name: strategic_coordination
functions.description: Coordinates strategic initiatives across all business functions.

functions.name: business_intelligence
functions.description: Delivers executive-level business intelligence and decision support.

CEO.name: ChiefExecutiveOfficer

functions.name: strategic_leadership
functions.description: Provides strategic direction, organizational vision, and executive decision-making.

functions.name: stakeholder_management
functions.description: Manages relationships with board, investors, and key stakeholders.

functions.name: organizational_culture
functions.description: Shapes and maintains organizational culture and values.

CEO.description: Chief Executive Officer agent implementing strategic leadership, organizational vision, stakeholder management, and executive decision-making capabilities.

CFO.name: ChiefFinancialOfficer

functions.name: financial_strategy
functions.description: Develops financial strategy, budget planning, and capital allocation.

functions.name: risk_management
functions.description: Manages financial risk, compliance, and regulatory requirements.

functions.name: investment_analysis
functions.description: Analyzes investments, acquisitions, and financial opportunities.

CFO.description: Chief Financial Officer agent implementing financial strategy, budget management, investment analysis, and financial risk assessment.

CMO.name: ChiefMarketingOfficer

functions.name: marketing_strategy
functions.description: Develops marketing strategy, brand positioning, and customer acquisition.

functions.name: market_research
functions.description: Conducts market research, competitive analysis, and customer insights.

functions.name: digital_marketing
functions.description: Manages digital marketing campaigns and customer engagement.

CMO.description: Chief Marketing Officer agent implementing marketing strategy, brand management, customer acquisition, and market research.

COO.name: ChiefOperatingOfficer

functions.name: operational_excellence
functions.description: Manages operations, process optimization, and operational efficiency.

functions.name: resource_management
functions.description: Optimizes resource allocation and capacity planning.

functions.name: quality_assurance
functions.description: Ensures quality standards and continuous improvement.

COO.description: Chief Operating Officer agent implementing operational excellence, process optimization, resource management, and quality assurance.

CTO.name: ChiefTechnologyOfficer

functions.name: technology_strategy
functions.description: Develops technology strategy, architecture, and innovation roadmap.

functions.name: engineering_leadership
functions.description: Leads engineering teams and technical excellence initiatives.

functions.name: security_oversight
functions.description: Ensures security, compliance, and risk management.

CTO.description: Chief Technology Officer agent implementing technology strategy, architecture design, innovation management, and security oversight.

CHRO.name: ChiefHumanResourcesOfficer

functions.name: talent_management
functions.description: Manages talent acquisition, development, and retention strategies.

functions.name: organizational_culture
functions.description: Builds organizational culture and employee engagement.

functions.name: performance_management
functions.description: Implements performance management and career development systems.

CHRO.description: Chief Human Resources Officer agent implementing talent management, organizational culture, performance management, and employee development.

Founder.name: FounderAgent

functions.name: vision_creation
functions.description: Creates and refines company vision, mission, and long-term strategic direction.

functions.name: product_strategy
functions.description: Develops product strategy, roadmaps, and innovation frameworks.

functions.name: fundraising
functions.description: Manages fundraising activities, investor relations, and capital strategy.

functions.name: team_scaling
functions.description: Builds founding team, establishes culture, and scales organizational structure.

Founder.description: FounderAgent implements comprehensive founder-specific functionality including vision creation, product strategy, fundraising execution, team scaling, and market opportunity identification. Inherits from LeadershipAgent.

Investor.name: Investor

functions.name: investment_analysis
functions.description: Provides investment analysis, portfolio management, and funding strategies.

Investor.description: Investor is an AI agent module based on PurposeDrivenAgent, focused on investment analysis, portfolio management, and funding strategies. It provides insights for capital allocation and risk assessment.

businessinfinity.asisaga.com.name: businessinfinity.asisaga.com

functions.name: web_interface
functions.description: Delivers a modern web interface for business automation, agent management, and analytics.

businessinfinity.asisaga.com.description: Frontend application for BusinessInfinity, delivering a modern web interface for business automation, agent management, and analytics. Enables users to interact with the platform's features and monitor business processes.

backend.name: BusinessInfinity Cloud API
backend.description: The frontend communicates with the backend via OpenAPI-defined endpoints on a separate Azure Functions deployment.

RealmOfAgents.name: RealmOfAgents

functions.name: agent_framework_foundation
functions.description: Foundation for building, composing, and orchestrating intelligent agents with learning, reasoning, and goal-driven behaviors.

RealmOfAgents.description: RealmOfAgents is a collection of advanced agent frameworks and the core AgentOperatingSystem. It provides the foundation for building, composing, and orchestrating intelligent agents with learning, reasoning, and goal-driven behaviors.

AgentOperatingSystem.name: AgentOperatingSystem

functions.name: orchestrate_agents
functions.description: Enables coordination, communication, and lifecycle management of autonomous agents. Provides communication infrastructure for agent orchestration using Azure Service Bus.

AgentOperatingSystem.description: AgentOperatingSystem is the core multi-agent orchestration engine, responsible for coordinating, communicating, and managing the lifecycle of autonomous agents. By leveraging PurposeDrivenAgent, it orchestrates intelligent, purpose-driven agents with explicit goals, learning, and reasoning. It supports extensibility, composability, and advanced integration with business and AI modules, providing robust communication infrastructure for agent orchestration (e.g., Azure Service Bus).

PurposeDrivenAgent.name: PurposeDrivenAgent

functions.name: purpose_driven_orchestration
functions.description: Orchestrates AI agents around a central purpose, enabling perpetual, ethical, and adaptive action. Integrates learning, knowledge sharing, and dynamic coordination to fulfill overarching objectives in alignment with human aspirations.

PurposeDrivenAgent.description: PurposeDrivenAgent is a modular agent framework for building intelligent agents with explicit goals, learning, and reasoning. It supports composability, inheritance, and integration with knowledge and code generation modules.

SelfLearningAgent.name: SelfLearningAgent

functions.name: autonomous_learning
functions.description: Enables agents to adapt, optimize, and improve performance over time through experience and feedback.

SelfLearningAgent.description: SelfLearningAgent is the foundational core for agents with autonomous learning capabilities. It enables agents to adapt, optimize, and improve performance over time through experience and feedback.

FineTunedLLM.name: FineTunedLLM

functions.name: domain_specific_llm
functions.description: Manages AML MLOps for domain-specific LLM training using LoRA adapters. Provides LLMs to PurposeDrivenAgent(s) for specialized knowledge.

FineTunedLLM.description: FineTunedLLM manages Azure Machine Learning (AML) MLOps for domain-specific LLM training using LoRA adapters. It provides domain-specific LLMs to PurposeDrivenAgent(s) (including C-Suite, Investor, and Founder), enabling them to leverage specialized knowledge and expertise.

_aiContext.purpose: Contains JSON Schema files for all configuration types. Used for validation and editor support.
Contains markdown documentation for all configuration files and the configuration changelog. Used for onboarding, reference, and AI context.
Contains example workflows and sample input files for the system. Used for demonstration and testing.
Template for required secrets and environment variables. Used for documentation and onboarding.
Provides additional documentation and module structure for AI assistants and tools. Not merged into the manifest at runtime.
Contains OpenAPI and API contract documentation for all modules. Used for AI and tooling context only.
Contains documentation file references for all modules. Used for AI and tooling context only.
Contains test suite directory references for all modules. Used for AI and tooling context only.
Contains shared configuration file references for all modules. Used for AI and tooling context only.
Contains Python package metadata for all modules. Used for AI and tooling context only.
Contains the unified dependency graph for all modules. Used for AI and tooling context only.
Contains integration strategy and entrypoints for all modules. Used for AI and tooling context only.
Contains refactorability guidelines and monorepo status. Used for AI and tooling context only.
Contains file glob patterns for all modules. Used for AI and tooling context only.
Contains the MCP (Model Context Protocol) module and all MCP submodules. Used for AI and tooling context only.
